Html:
Hello, I've follow all step to install the RibbonGenerator, Under win 8.1 and vs pro 2013 (pack 4)... I've got a french version.
And still have the message that RibbonGenerator is not find on my system...

I've installed First the win 8.1 sdk... the visual studio 2013 sdk... I've compiled...
I registred, and use the gacutil exe...

Does anyone has an idea to solve this ?

Thanks in advance for any help.

Hello, It's seems to work now, I've just reinstall visual studio sdk again after all steps describe in :
https://bernhardelbl.wordpress.com/2013/11/26/windows-ribbon-for-winforms-in-visual-studio-2013/

I reboot, and now the tool is found !

Strange, but this is the way I do...

With best regards,

mlcvista
